general_advisory: Farmers are advised to avoid irrigation and spraying operations during periods of rainfall. Take precautions against high wind speeds to protect crops.

advisory: Nursery sowing should be completed by end of 2nd fortnight of July.
Main field land preparation should be done by puddling the field twice at 7-10 days intervals.
Apply recommended amount of fertilizers during puddling and at transplanting.
Ideal sowing time is June 20 to end of July for kharif maize.
Treat seeds with fungicides and insecticides before sowing.
Start raised bed nursery preparation for kharif vegetable crops.
Avoid planting and intercultural operations during heavy rainfall.
Ensure deworming and vaccination of animals during the rainy season.
Keep animals in safe places and provide clean drinking water.
